label: Contest
title: Win a Naitec Stellair
subtitle: Join the contest and win amazing prizes! You can win a premium air conditioner Naitec Stellair, a brand new iPhone 16, or 4th generation AirPods.
info_1: The contest runs from July 14, 2025 to October 14, 2025.
info_2: There will be three separate drawings during the contest, with one winner selected each month.
terms_item_1_text_1: To enter the contest, you must meet the following conditions:
terms_item_1_text_2: Follow the profile @naitecat on Instagram.
terms_item_1_text_3: Follow the page Naitec Österreich on Facebook.
terms_item_1_text_4: Fill in and submit the <scroll>contest form</scroll> published on our website.
terms_item_1_text_5: Only participants who meet all of the above conditions will be entered into the contest.
terms_item_2_text_1: The contest runs from July 14, 2025 to October 14, 2025. There will be three separate drawings during the contest, with one winner selected each month.
terms_item_2_text_2: The drawings will take place on the following dates:
terms_item_2_text_6: Each participant who meets the contest conditions will be entered into all remaining drawings until the end of the contest, unless they win in one of the previous rounds.
terms_item_2_text_7: The winner will be notified via email sent to the address provided in the contest form. The prize will be awarded after verification of compliance with all contest conditions.
terms_item_3_text_1: To validate participation in the contest, the participant must:
terms_item_3_text_3: be a citizen of the Slovak Republic
terms_item_3_text_4: follow the profile @naitecat on Instagram
terms_item_3_text_5: follow the page Naitec Österreich on Facebook
terms_item_3_text_6: fill in and submit the <scroll>contest form</scroll>
terms_item_3_text_7: By entering the contest, the participant confirms that they agree to the contest rules and the processing of personal data for the purpose of its organization.
terms_item_3_text_8: The organizer reserves the right to disqualify participants who do not meet the conditions or violate the contest rules.
terms_item_4_text_1: You can win the following prizes in the contest:
terms_item_4_text_4: Naitec Stellair air conditioner — drawing on October 14, 2025
terms_item_4_text_5: The prize cannot be legally enforced or exchanged for cash or other material compensation. The organizer reserves the right to change the prizes in case of unforeseen circumstances, ensuring a prize of equal or greater value.

agreements_info: Following the official Naitec Österreich profiles on Instagram and Facebook is a condition of participation in the contest. Participants who do not meet this condition will lose their right to win.
